attributes.action: I think all NHS/virgin care workers should receive a good pay rise/bonus.
attributes.additional_details: Please give all NHS/virgin care workers a payrise/bonus for working hard and saving life’s in this pandemic.
attributes.background: I have been told that supermarkets and other company’s having been giving their staff pay rises, due to their hard work in this pandemic. Yet yesterday I was told that virgin care staff would not be getting any extra, to which I feel this is disgraceful.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign these petitions, which call for similar actions: 

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work  
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073  

Pay rise for NHS and care staff 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488  

Reward our healthcare heroes now for risking their lives to fight Covid-19.  
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318741  

Give NHS staff a pay rise in line with MPs pay increase.  
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313513  

Introduce a minimum starting wage of £40000 for all Nurses.  
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315297  

Pay all NHS Staff at least the Real Living Wage 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310615 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
